summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Schooltino school management system. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has critical React runtime errors preventing full UI testing.

critical_bugs.issue: Runtime error: 'Objects are not valid as a React child' causing app crash after school creation
critical_bugs.error_details: throwOnInvalidObjectType error in React reconciliation, likely in school creation success flow or navigation components
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents navigation to other pages after school creation, blocks full UI testing
critical_bugs.affected_flow: School creation success â†’ Navigation to other pages

ui_bugs.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings for DialogContent

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical React runtime error: 'Objects are not valid as a React child'. This error occurs after school creation and prevents navigation to other pages. Check school creation success handling, navigation components, and ensure all React children are valid elements/strings/numbers, not objects. Error appears in reconcileChildrenArray and createChild functions.
